Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a red pottery vessel, the fabric is relatively coarse and grey in section, the exterior is covered with a light-brown slip and faint traces of the end of a single line of black-painted demotic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394965) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394965)
